content: learn how to crochet a granny square these charming squares are versatile allowing you to create a variety of projects for example hats bags tops and blankets also did you know there are loads of different granny square designs i have several different designs for you to try so keep reading and you ll find the links further down the post but first let s learn more about the basic granny square although the granny square might look difficult it is in fact a beginner friendly pattern using just three stitches to create this iconic design which is a great starting point when learning how to crochet free pattern and videos for left and right handed can be found at https //blog bellacococrochet com/crochet-basic-granny-square/ written in uk terms crochet skills needed stitch s st s slip_stitch s slip_stitch s insert hook yarn over pull through stitch and loop on hook chain s chain s yarn over pull through treble_crochet s treble_crochet s yarn over insert into stitch yarn over pull up a loop you will have three loops on the hook yarn over pull through two loops yarn over pull through remaining two loops
